str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to 'grave', especially to write; figuratively, to describe.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Masculine Plural
Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To bring back word, report; I announce, declare. From ana and the base of aggelos; to announce.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To consider, understand, perceive. From sun and hiemi; to put together, i.e. to comprehend; by implication, to act piously.
